semantics.label: translate:: Description
semantics.description: translate:: Description of the goals page.
semantics.default: translate:: Insert the goals that you have chosen to work with.

semantics.label: translate:: Define goal link text
semantics.description: translate:: Text that will be displayed on the button for creating a new goal.

semantics.label: translate:: Label for a user defined goal
semantics.description: translate:: Text that will be displayed as label on a user created goal.

semantics.label: translate:: Define goal placeholder
semantics.description: translate:: Text that will be displayed as a placeholder when creating a new goal.

semantics.label: translate:: Text indicating how many goals has been added
semantics.description: translate:: This text will follow after the amount of goals that is currently created, example: 'Goals added: 5' where 'Goals added:' is this text.

semantics.label: translate:: Label for help text
semantics.description: translate:: Label for showing additional helpful information to the user.

semantics.label: translate:: Fill in additional help information
semantics.description: translate:: Here you can fill in additional helpful information for the user.

fields.label: translate:: Message
fields.default: translate:: Are you sure you want to delete this goal?
